Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel - great everything”
Reviews.Author: travelpartners4life
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 yr anniversary drove montreal washington dc arrived bit tired ready luxury treatment hotel provided exactly called advance russell handwritten note treats left prior arrival surprise husband staff willing restaurants recommendations planned ahead time couples massage lovely spa hotel highly recommend allowing time sit relaxation enjoy fruit peace hotel located center town rue st catharine cab montreal times 10 highly recommend european feel cobblestone streets cafes souveneir shops notre dame etc amenities hotel perfect fridge minibar options fantastic bedpillows molton brown products die smell hair look perfect soaking tub enjoyed couple evenings bathroom beautiful clean lines spacious 2 computers printer guest lobby guess disappointed 26night fee parking car awfully discounted guests 2 3 nights loved visit montreal extended vacation 1 night disappointed charged parking night wait montreal people sooo nice looking forward staying hotel le crystal

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but falls short in other areas”
Reviews.Author: gumilla
Reviews.Content: wife stayed le crystal 3 nights attended conference hotel location nice salt water pool spa etc tie loose le crystal top hotel wonder arrived hot stuffy ac unit functioning maintenance fixed pretty quickly decided pool girl looking laptop time outside worker looked complaining decided salad drink waited waited hour restaurant pool food told cancel didnt concerned night decided service followed instructions left message dont checked messages night decided eat restaurant weakest link le crystal crowded atmosphere chaotic waiters running forth waiter probably restaurant manager beverage manager charge laughing loudly table 30 minutes time concerned customers chipped helped waiters chaotic atmosphere earn respect wait staff food average pricey weird dining experience experience le crystal 5star amenities 3star execution try future

Reviews.Content: stay hotel crystal montreal travel alot stay hotel hands own league service ate restaurant time chicken pool roof air hot tub usually travel friends montreal hockey games ufc cater thanks alot truly hotel

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely perfect!”

Reviews.Title: “Literally the best hotel in Montreal”
Reviews.Author: globetrotterCardiff
Reviews.Content: stayed le crystal winter partner week period truly gem hotel sets bar hotels montreal arrival staff extremely helpful immaculate spacious excellent bathroom molten brown toiletries appreciated furthermore swimming pool rooftop hot tub added special stay hotel restaurant la coupole exceptional concierge desk helpful giving advice restaurants bars etc stuff hotel special deserves ranking thank le crystal stay special

Reviews.Title: “Loved this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: DETNYC
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel le crystal montreal getaway couple hotel perfect location walking distance restaurants bars shops suite bit sofa etc beautifully decorated delighted hotel provided molton brown toiletries bathroom comparison scale else shower pool gym nice cant remember floor middle hotelcondo building believe condos floors hotel floors below rate pool included terrace hot tub amazing views mt royale city below peek daytime actually day advantage hot tub view evening amazing night brunch restaurant hotel food delicious overpriced restaurants nearby left wishing opted instead save dollars oh overall definitely recommend hotel planning montreal stay heartbeat

Reviews.Content: travel montreal frequently nicest hotel city incredibly warm comfortable modern decor bathrooms amenities location excellent staff complaint blvd rene levesque bit loud street noise highly highly recommend

Reviews.Content: hotel le crystal modern wellappointed property montreal location convenient citys popular centers dining entertainment stay started rocky satisfied absolutely wonderful civilized enjoyed comfortable sleeping separate rest suite bathroom modern design luxurious products molton brown generous size couch sizable wet useful relaxing advantage espresso machine originally cleaned smelled spray whatever previous guests left inspire air freshener set quickly settling hear key access door lady bathrobe barges housekeeping obviously checking front desk woman daughters phone charger seen insisted looking tried move housekeeping staffer wouldnt stop talking phone charger finally exited couple minutes standing dumbfounded couple minutes called front desk happened lady housekeeping discussion hallway appeared management inappropriate hallway glad situation handled totally woman housekeeping assumed moved unexpectedly doesnt excuse checking satisfied response glitch else hotel valet staff view pleasant check smoothly stay recommend
